mapper.select: SELECT c.*,a.actor_name,a.actor_id FROM character c join actor_character ac on c.character_id=ac.character_id join actor a on a.actor_id=ac.actor_id WHERE c.musical_id=#{musical_id} ORDER BY c.character_id DESC OFFSET (#{vo.page} - 1) * #{vo.perPageNum} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{vo.perPageNum} ROWS ONLY
select count(character_id) from character where musical_id = #{musical_id} and character_id > 0
mapper.update: update character set character_name=#{character_name} where character_id = #{character_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO character (character_id, musical_id, character_name) values (character_seq.nextval,#{musical_id},#{character_name})
mapper.select: select c.character_id from character c where c.musical_id = #{musical_id} and c.character_name=#{character_name}

SELECT c.*,musical_title,ac.actor_id FROM character c, musical m, actor_character ac WHERE ac.actor_id=#{actor_id} and c.musical_id=m.musical_id and ac.character_id=c.character_id ORDER BY c.character_id DESC OFFSET (#{vo.page} - 1) * #{vo.perPageNum} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{vo.perPageNum} ROWS ONLY
